Tossed up, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara tucks it to mid-wicket.
Flatter, full and on off, Lahiru Udara goes down for the reverse sweep but misses and gets hit on the pads. A slighe appeal for LBW, but turned down.
Flighted, full and on off, Lahiru Udara drills it through covers for a couple of more runs.
Floated, full and around off, Lahiru Udara strides out and drives it firmly towards sweeper covers for a brace.
Flighted, full and on off, Lahiru Udara drives it through cover-point for one.
Short again and outside off, Pathum Nissanka cuts it hard but straight towards point where a fumble allows a run.
Goes short and on middle, Pathum Nissanka pats it back to the bowler.
Floated, full and around off, Lahiru Udara steers it to through point for a run.
Just short! Tossed up, full and on off, turns away, Pathum Nissanka drives it a bit uppishly. The fielder at silly point dives forward but the ball falls well in front of him. A single taken.
Flatter, short and on off, Pathum Nissanka stabs it to point.
Drags his length back, on middle, Pathum Nissanka punches it to long on for one.
Flatter. full and on middle, turns in, Pathum Nissanka comes forward and tucks it to short mid-wicket.
Goes short and on off, Pathum Nissanka pats it back to the bowler.
Flighted, full and on off, Lahiru Udara opens the face of his bat and steers it towards point for a run.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Pathum Nissanka uses his feet and eses it to long on for a single.
Floated, full and on off, Pathum Nissanka prods forward to block it out.
More flight, full and on leg, Lahiru Udara clips it to mid-wicket. A few tight overs from Bangladesh now!
Tossed up, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara taps it towards short covers.
Fires one full and on middle and leg, Lahiru Udara tucks it to short mid-wicket.
Flighted, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara blocks it out nicely.
Floated, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara turns it to the leg side.
Quicker, short and on middle, Pathum Nissanka clips it through mid-wicket for a single.
Looped up, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara fends it away.
Short again, on middle, Pathum Nissanka nudges it through mid-wikcet for a run.
Slower through the air, full and on off, turns in, Pathum Nissanka clips it to backward square leg.
Flighted, full and on middle and off, Pathum Nissanka defends it on the front foot.
Tossed up, full and on off, Pathum Nissanka prods forward and blocks it out.
Shorter in length, on middle, Lahiru Udara flicks it off the back foot through square leg for a single.
MAIDEN OVER! Short and on off, Pathum Nissanka punches it to short covers.
Gives this one more air, full and on middle, Pathum Nissanka defends it on the front foot.
Flighted, full and on middle, Pathum Nissanka prods forward and fends it off the sticker of the bat to the leg side.
Floated, full and on middle, Pathum Nissanka strides out to defend but gets an inside edge towards square leg. Udara wants the run but is sent back and rightly so.
Flatter, full and on leg, Pathum Nissanka stays back and knocks it down the pitch.
Tossed up, full and on middle and leg, Pathum Nissanka drives it back to the bowler.
FOUR! Spoils the over! Flighted, full and on off, Lahiru Udara goes down for the reverse sweep but gets a top edge that races to the third man fence for a boundary. Bangladesh won't mind that!
Short again, on middle, Lahiru Udara nudges it to mid-wicket.
Shorter in length, on off, turns in, Lahiru Udara stays back and clips it to square leg.
Flatter, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara turns it to short mid-wicket.
Goes a bit short and on middle, Lahiru Udara stays back and keeps it out to the leg side.
Floated, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara blocks it out down the pitch.
Slows it up, full and on middle, turns away, Pathum Nissanka blocks it out solidly. Four dots to end the over!
Looped up, full and on middle, Pathum Nissanka pushes it to silly point.
Flighted, full and on middle, Pathum Nissanka knocks it back to the bowler.
Quicker, full and on middle, angling in, Pathum Nissanka stays back and just manages to clip it to square leg.
Flatter, short and on off, Lahiru Udara guides it through point for a single.
Tossed up, full and on off, Lahiru Udara taps it towards covers and wants the run but is sent back.
FOUR! Put away! A low full toss, on middle, angling in. Pathum Nissanka presents the full face of the bat and drives it gloriously past the bowler for another boundary.
Short of a length and on off, Lahiru Udara cuts it through point for a run. 50-RUN STAND between the openers. A half-century opening partnership for Sri Lanka after 20 innings in Tests. Good start!
Full and on off, angling in, Pathum Nissanka steers it towards point for a single.
Nahid Rana bangs in a quick and sharp bouncer, on fof, Pathum Nissanka ducks under it.
FOUR! Lovely shot! Goes much fuller and just around off, Pathum Nissanka leans onto his drive nicely, opens the face of his bat and creams it through covers for a boundary.
Good length and on the sixth stump line, Pathum Nissanka stays back and pats it to short covers.
Looped up, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara defends it on the front foot.

A massive appeal for LBW, but turned down! Najmul Hossain Shanto has a chat with his keeper and bowler and takes the review. Slower through the air, full and on middle, turns away sharply. Lahiru Udara goes down to sweep it away but misses and gets hit around his midriff. UltraEdge confirms no bat involved, and on the replay, it looked like Bangladesh had their man. But Ball Tracking shows that it is bouncing a bit too much, and wickets is umpire's call. Lucky escape for Udara!
Goes short and around off, Pathum Nissanka cuts it through point for another run.
Flighted, full and on off, turns away, Pathum Nissanka stays back and steers it to point.
Arm ball, full and on middle, skids through, Lahiru Udara looks to defend with a straight bat but gets an inside edge towards square leg for a run.
Floated, short and around off, turns away, Pathum Nissanka punches it through covers for a single.
Short of a length and outside off, Lahiru Udara punches it away wide of deep point for a brace. 10 runs off the over!
Hits the length hard, on middle and off, Lahiru Udara dabs it to point.
Back of a length and around off, Lahiru Udara pats it towards covers.

FOUR! Bangladesh are leaking runs from both ends! Overpitched and on middle, angling in again. Lahiru Udara stays in his crease, lets the ball come to him before tucking it away to the deep mid-wicket fence for another boundary.
Good length and on middle, angling in, Litton Das clips it to square leg.

FOUR! Gets greeted with a boundary! Nahid Rana goes a bit too full and angling into the pads. Lahiru Udara brings his wrists into play and flicks it away with nice timing through square leg for four runs.
Arm ball, full and on middle, angling in, Pathum Nissanka blocks it out on the front foot.
Slower through the air, full and on off, Pathum Nissanka strides out and fends it to short covers.
FOUR! Fine shot! Taijul Islam drags his length back, outside off, turns away. Pathum Nissanka picks up the length early, rocks back and swats it wide of mid on for a boundary.
Flighted, full and on off, Lahiru Udara pushes it through covers for a single.
Floated, full and on middle again, Lahiru Udara turns it to the leg side.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Lahiru Udara knocks it to mid on.
Pitched up and on middle and leg, Pathum Nissanka clips it to square leg.
Pulls his length back a bit, on the sixth stump line, Pathum Nissanka leaves it alone.
Full again, on middle, shaping in, Lahiru Udara misses his flick as the ball goes off his pads towards square leg. A leg bye taken.
Touch fuller and on middle and off, Lahiru Udara blocks it out nicely.

FOUR! Put away! Short of a length and on middle, Lahiru Udara gets on top of the bounce and pulls it away. He does not get it from the middle of the bat but hits it well wide of mid-wicket for a boundary.
Good-length delivery, on off, angling in, Lahiru Udara pats it down towards short covers.
Flatter and outside off, Nissanka cuts it to sweeper cover for a couple of runs.
The arm ball, around off, Nissanka punches it to point.
Too full and on middle, spins away. Cuts Lahiru Udara in half as he splices his shot to point for one.
Tossed up, around off and turns away. Nissanka works it to mid-wicket for a single.
Flighted on the leg side, drilled to mid on.
Flatter and outside off, Lahiru Udara slaps it to covers for a run.
Goes fuller and around off, defended to cover.
Good length delivery on off and nips in. Nissanka defends right under his eyes.
FOUR! HELPED AWAY! Slants in a length ball on middle and leg. Nissanka plays with soft hands to fine leg and it races away.
Much better! Comes back and targets the stumps with a fuller delivery, defended.
FOUR! Just like his first boundary! Ebadot Hossain offers width on the off side, Nissanka crunches it through point and it races to the fence.
Serves it full and on middle and leg, Lahiru Udara nudges it to square leg for a single.
Drifts this one on the pads. Lahiru Udara goes back and turns it to square leg for one.
Angles in a full ball on off, spins away. Lahiru Udara leans and solidly defends.
Floated full and outside off, Nissanka punches it to deep cover for a single.
Tossed up angling on middle, Nissanka blocks it out.
Lahiru Udara is underway! Drops it full and outside off. Lahiru Udara taps it to point for a single.
Tossed up on middle, Lahiru Udara eases it to mid on.
Shorter and outside off, Nissanka shoulders arms to it.
Very full and around off, Nissanka steps across and blocks it out.
BEATEN! Tad fuller and well wide outside off. Nissanka is tempted to drive as he plants his front foot across but misses.
A good length delivery, shaping on off. Nissanka watchfully blocks.
Goes fuller and bowls it on middle and leg. Nissanka nudges it to mid-wicket.
Solid shot to get off the mark! Short of a length and outside off. Nissanka punches it square on the off side, through the gap and beats the fielder to the fence.

OUT! GONE! The debutant takes the final wicket! He ends with a three-fer! Flighted full and outside off. Islam swings hard as he tries to go downtown but cue ends his shot to mid on where Dinesh Chandimal takes it.
Taijul Islam c D Chandimal b S Dinusha 33 (60b 5x4 0x6)
Slows it up, fuller and outside off, defended out.
Tossed up on middle, Islam punches it back to the bowler.

Short in length and on leg, Rana gets in a tangle as he tries to flick it away, he misses and it rolls past his gloves on the leg side and to the keeper. Sri Lanka appeal and takes the review quickly after the umpire turns it down. UltraEdge shows a flat line as it rolls past his gloves.
A bumper, outside off. Islam rides as he hops and hits it to cover for a single.
Short of a length and outside off, Islam carves it in the gap past point for a couple of runs.
Angles it on the pads. Islam flicks it behind square leg and denies the run.
Keeps charging in with the bouncer, this is on middle, Islam leaves it.
Angles in a shorter delivery on off from around the wicket. Islam looks to work it across but instead gets hit on his left glove.
Tad short and outside off, Islam cuts it to deep point for a single.
FOUR! MORE! This is frustrating the Lankans now! Islam takes the charge and heaves this full ball over mid-wicket for a boundary.
FOUR! Handy innings from Islam! Floated around off, Islam reverse sweeps it past first slip and into the third man fence. Quality shot.
On middle, it turns away. Islam waits and blocks off the back foot.
Fuller ball on middle, lands and spins away. Islam solidly blocks it out.
Tharindu Rathnayake tosses it up around off, Islam defends it well.
Shorter and cramping Rana for room, he tries to defend and does so awkwardly.
Length ball, outside off, Nahid Rana defends it to cover.

JUST SHORT! Too full and outside off, Islam steps down and smashes it to extra cover, he toe ends his shot to the fielder there. Kamindu Mendis dives forward and spills it out. It will count as a drop.
Shorter and outside off, Islam looks to hoick it away but misses it.
Bowls a low full toss, outside off, punched to deep cover for no run.
Pushes it full and just outside off, invites Islam to drive but he misses.
A bumper on leg, Nahid Rana ducks under it.
Shorter and slanting on leg, Islam pulls it to deep square leg for a single.
Good length ball, outside off, Islam knocks it to cover.
Shorter and on middle and leg. Islam sits under it.
FOUR! Crucial runs! Touch fuller and a lot of width on offer. Islam smashes it over covers and it rolls to the fence.
Short in length and around off, Islam looks to ramp it over but misses.
Bowls it full and outside off, Nahid Rana leaves it alone.
Good length delivery on middle, Nahid Rana blocks.
Welcomes Nahid Rana with a bouncer on leg, the batter sits under it.

OUT! LBW! Ebadot Hossain has missed a straight delivery! He reviews but more in hope. Touch fuller and shaping on middle and leg, holds its line. Ebadot Hossain doesn't even get his bat across and gets pinged on the pads. An appeal for LBW and up goes the finger. Ebadot Hossain takes the review but gets THREE REDS in return.
Ebadot Hossain lbw A Fernando 8 (13b 1x4 0x6)
Similar delivery! Into the surface, around off and shoots up. Islam plays with more command on the leg side for one.
Bowls it into the surface and generates some extra bounce, this is around off. Ebadot Hossain gets his bat in front and somehow plays it on the leg side for one.
A proper bouncer from Vishwa Fernando to end the over, Islam ducks under it.
Short of a length and outside off, Islam drags his shot to mid-wicket.
Touch fuller and outside off. Islam tries to take on mid off but hits to the fielder on a bounce.
Goes very full and shaping on off, Islam looks to push but gets an inside edge onto the pads.
On a length and around off, nips in. Islam stays behind the line and blocks.
Serves a bumper on middle, Islam looks to pull but gets beaten.
Nicely bowled! An outswinging yorker, in the outside off region. Ebadot Hossain without any foot movement tries to push but misses.
Hard length delivery on middle, Ebadot Hossain fends it on the leg side.
Asitha Fernando bangs it short and on middle and leg, cramps Islam who pulls and top edges it just over the man at short leg. The fielder runs back but it falls well short.
Touch fuller and around off, Ebadot Hossain knocks it down to cover for a sharp single.
Pushes it on a length and outside off, shapes away. Ebadot Hossain shoulders arms to it.
Serves it slightly short and outside off, holds its line. Ebadot Hossain has a poke at it but misses.
Drags his length back and bowls it down leg. Islam looks to pull but misses it.
Good length delivery, outside off. Islam punches it to cover.
Goes wide of the line, bowls it well outside off. Islam swings and misses.
FOUR! Wonderful shot! Vishwa Fernando bangs it short and around off, Islam pulls it crisply through mid-wicket and it races to the fence.
Pitches it up and lands it across, outside off, Islam drives it straight to cover.
Starts with a nip-backer, fuller and on middle, Ebadot Hossain nudges it to mid-wicket for a quick single.
Floated around off, fuller and Ebadot Hossain slog-sweeps it to deep mid-wicket for one. THAT WILL BE STUMPS.
Full and spinning down leg. Ebadot Hossain lets it go.
FOUR! BANG! Out of nowhere! Too full and on middle, Ebadot Hossain clears his front leg and thumps it to long off for four.
Flatter and outside off, holds its line. Ebadot Hossain looks to push but misses.
Too full and outside off, Islam drives it to cover for an easy single.
Angles it full and on middle, Islam leans and blocks it out.
Asitha Fernando serves a yorker on middle, Ebadot Hossain digs it out well.

OUT! BOWLED! What a ripper! Nayeem Hasan couldn't survive probably the last over of the day! Asitha Fernando serves it on a good length and around off, nips in. Hasan plays inside the line and is beaten as he looks to defend. He misses and it crashes the stumps.
Nayeem Hasan b A Fernando 25 (51b 2x4 0x6)
Bye! Bangs it short and on middle, swings away late. Islam ducks and the keeper gets a hand to it to his right and keeps it down to a bye.
FOUR! Helped away fine! Short in length and on leg, Islam tickles it and it brushes the keeper's glove onto his right before it runs down to the fence.
Short in length and on the hips. Islam keeps it out on the leg side.
Starts with a bumper on middle. Islam ducks under it.
Spins in a full ball on middle, this is nudged to mid on.
Gives a bit of flight and bowls outsideoff, this is driven to cover for a single.
Bowls it full and outside off. Islam blocks it with soft hands.
Tossed up, outside off. Islam steps across and defends.
Flat and outside off, Hasan pulls it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Floats it full and outside off, angled away and stays low. Hasan looks to defend but misses it.
Keeps it full and outside off, Islam nicely drives but finds the man at point.
Angles in a full ball on off, blocked out.
Short in length and outside off, hint of away movement. Islam has a poke at it but misses. Kusal Mendis appeals as he feels there is something on it but gets no support.
Fuller delivery, outside off, punched to cover.
Length ball, outside off, Hasan punches it to cover for a single.
Length ball on middle, shaping in. Islam looks to flick but gets a sharp leading edge to point for one.
Full and shaping on middle, Islam keeps the strike as he tucks it to mid-wicket.
Flighted outside off. Islam leaves it alone.
Fuller delivery, outside off, Islam looks to drive but misses.
Too full and on middle, Hasan eases it to long on for a single.

How has that missed the stumps? Very full and on middle, Hasan digs it out late and manages an inside edge to fine leg for a couple. Faint edge. Tharindu Rathnayake appeals for LBW but there was bat on it.
Fuller and around off, spins in. Hasan leans and defends.

CHANCE! Length and around off, Hasan drops it to the right of point. Hasan calls for the run but is late to rush across. Pathum Nissanka picks up and aims at the bowler's end but misses. Would have been tight.
On a length and around the fourth stump line. Hasan solidly defends.
Very full and on middle, drilled to mid on.
Shapes in a full ball on off, played back to the bowler.
This is full and outside off, Hasan pushes it to cover.
A good length ball, outside off. Hasan taps it to point.
Short, down leg, Taijul Islam looks to block it but gets hit on his pads. A stifled appeal but turned down.
Too full, on off, Taijul Islam leans on and blocks it back.
Full, on off, Taijul Islam pushes it to covers.
Flatter, drifting down leg, Taijul Islam looks to block it but wears it on his pads.
Short, just outside off, Nayeem Hasan cuts it through point for one. 200 comes up for Bangladesh.
Flighted up, on off, Nayeem Hasan blocks it back.
On a length, outside off, Taijul Islam leaves it alone.
Short and wide, Nayeem Hasan slaps it to deep point for one.
Edgy! Length, outside off, Taijul Islam looks to block it but edges it to the left of the keeper. The ball just lands short of the keeper as the batters collect a single.
Back of a length, on off, Taijul Islam blocks it back.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! On a length, outside off, shaping away. Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to drive it but gets a thick edge. The ball carries towards the first slip, where Kamindu Mendis takes a good low catch. The umpires check for a clean catch and the replays show that the fingers were beneath the ball when the catch was taken. The onfield decision stands!
Mehidy Hasan Miraz c K Mendis b V Fernando 31 (42b 3x4 0x6)
On a length, down leg, Nayeem Hasan leaves. The keeper fails to collect it as the batters cross for a bye.
Short and wide, Nayeem Hasan slaps it to point for one.
Down the leg side, Nayeem Hasan leaves it alone.
Tossed up, on off, Nayeem Hasan flicks it to mid-wicket.
Turn and bounce, on off, Nayeem Hasan blocks it back.
Down the leg side, Nayeem Hasan looks to flick it but misses.
Fuller one, on middle, Nayeem Hasan lunges and blocks it.
Quicker, on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz leans on and blocks it to short covers.
Too full, on leg, Nayeem Hasan flicks it to mid-wicket for one.
Short and wide, Nayeem Hasan looks to cut it but misses.
Fuller one, on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz flicks it to square leg.
FOUR! Well played! Flighted up, outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz goes deep in his crease and guides it through short third for a boundary.
Short, outside off, slower too. Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to cut it but misses.
Short, on leg, Nayeem Hasan blocks it solidly.
Down the leg side, Nayeem Hasan leaves it alone.
Quicker, on leg, Nayeem Hasan flicks it to mid-wicket.
Goes Fuller again, on off, Nayeem Hasan knocks it to the mid on fielder.
Fuller, on off, Nayeem Hasan digs it back.
Flatter, on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz tucks it to mid-wicket for one.
Well outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz cuts it to deep point for a single.
Flat and outside off, Hasan knocks it to cover for a single.
Slower in the air, full and on middle, Hasan defends in front of his pads.
Tossed up around off, Hasan prods and blocks.

FOUR! Half-a-chance! Serves it full and angling on leg. Hasan skips down to heave but gets a faint edge and it rolls through his legs and to the right of leg slip. No chance for the fielder. A boundary.
Sonal Dinusha keeps it full and around off, Hasan blocks on the off side.
Shorter and outside off, Hasan slaps it to sweeper cover for a single.
Floats it full and on middle, Hasan gets forward and solidly blocks.
One more run as Mehidy Hasan Miraz hits it to point.
Quicker and outside off, Hasan plays it to cover for a single.
FOUR! HIT AWAY! Tossed up, outside off, Hasan comes down the track and slams it down to long on for a boundary. Welcome boundary.
Fuller delivery, outside off, Hasan shoulders arms to it
Outside off, Hasan strokes it to deep cover for a single.
Floated on middle, Hasan prods and blocks it out.
Shapes in a full ball on the pads. Hasan misses his flick and gets hit on the pads. An appeal for LBW but that was easily going down.
Too full and around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it to long off for one.
Bowls it full and angling around off. Mehidy Hasan Miraz leans and defends.
Bowls it into the surface, spins away, outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz works it to mid-wicket for one.
Tossed up on off, spins in. Hasan looks to sweep but top edges it behind the keeper to fine leg for one.
Floated full and on off, stays low. Hasan leans and blocks.
Quicker delivery on middle, defended out.
Bowls it full and on middle, Hasan lunges forward and defends.
Flighted on middle, punched to cover for a single.
Tossed up on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz inside edges his shot to square leg for one.
Well played! Angles in a full ball on off. Hasan gets inside the line and sweeps it to square leg for one.
Flighted on the leg side, tucked to square leg for a single.
Flatter delivery on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz nudges it to square leg.
The arm ball, full and on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz goes back and blocks.
Slants it full and on middle, played back to the bowler.
A bumper on middle, Hasan lets it go.
Shorter and outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pulls it to mid-wicket for a single.
On middle, Hasan pulls it to deep square leg for a single. He is off the mark.
Anticipates a short ball and Mehidy Hasan Miraz steps across and pulls it to fine leg for one.
Asitha Fernando goes short and around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pulls it to square leg.
FOUR! SHOT! Fuller ball, outside off, swings away. Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it through covers and it races to the fence.

OUT! TAKEN! Sonal Dinusha is having a dream start! Mushfiqur Rahim goes! Tossed up, around off, spins away. Mushfiqur Rahim slog-sweeps, he tries to take on deep mid-wicket. Vishwa Fernando was standing yards in front of the ropes, he rushes to his left and holds onto it. Solid catch.
Mushfiqur Rahim c V Fernando b S Dinusha 35 (75b 5x4 0x6)
Fuller and outside off, driven to deep cover for a single.
An arm ball, full and around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz prods and blocks.
Sonal Dinusha sticks to the same line and length. Mehidy Hasan Miraz defends.
Flights it full and on middle, defends out.
Flighted full and on middle, nudged to square leg.
Goes short and on off, this is pulled to square leg for a single.
FOUR! HIT HARD! Short in length and around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz pulls it hard through mid-wicket for a boundary.
A bouncer on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz sits under it.
Leg bye! Keeps it short and bowls it on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim half-ducks and gets hit on the back, it rolls to fine leg for a leg bye.
Short delivery again on middle, Mehidy Hasan Miraz takes on as he pulls it to deep square leg who stops well for a single.
Asitha Fernando bowling short stuff to Miraz! This is angling on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to pull but misses.
Flatter and shaping around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz knocks it to cover for a single.
Floated full and on middle, blocked out.
Shorter and outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz dabs it through third man for a couple. 150 up for Bangladesh!
Fuller delivery on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim turns it to mid-wicket for one.
TWO LEG BYES! Spills it full and angling down. Mushfiqur Rahim misses his flick and it rolls off the pads to fine leg.
Tossed up on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim leans and blocks.
Slightly short and around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz thinks to pull but eventually leaves it.
Short in length and outside off. Mehidy Hasan Miraz leaves it alone.
Bowls a juicy full toss on middle, this is flicked to mid-wicket.
Drops it short and on leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz ducks under it.
On a length and outside off. Mehidy Hasan Miraz cuts it to deep point where the fielder dives to his left and saves a couple. Good stop.
Asitha Fernando serves a bumper on off. Miraz sits under it.
Maiden to start the session. Flat and outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim gets low and pushes it to point.
Bowls it outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim cuts it to point.
Well outside off, shorter. Mushfiqur Rahim slaps it to point.
Flat and comes with the arm, outside off and stays low. Mushfiqur Rahim steps across and pads it away. Sri Lanka appeal as it came with an angle but it is turned down.
Flighted full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim leans and defends.
Sonal Dinusha tosses it up and bowls it full on off. Rahim blocks.
Short, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim punches it through covers for one. That will be Tea Break on Day 1!
Quicker, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim lunges and blocks it back.
Fuller one, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it to covers.
Turn and bounce, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim defends it back.
